name: Advisory Summit 2016 IoT Cloud
description: A Node-RED instance for Heroku with pre-installed Salesforce, Particle, MongoDB, and MQTT nodes.

MONGODB_URL.description: Copy Hostname from MONGOLAB_URI Config Variable (mqtt://<hostname>:<port>/<database-name>) including the username and password (leave out mongodb://, port number, and database name` at the end)

MONGODB_PORT.description: Copy Port number from MONGOLAB_URI Config Variable (mqtt://<hostname>:<port>/<database-name>)

MONGODB_DATABASE.description: Copy Database Name from MONGOLAB_URI Config Variable (mqtt://<hostname>:<port>/<database-name>

PARTICLE_DEVICE_ID.description: Copy Device Id (24-digit alphanumeric) from command prompt by running 'particle list'

SALESFORCE_USERNAME.description: Enter Salesforce Username from Developer/Production Org

SALESFORCE_CONSUMER_KEY.description: Enter Connected App (need to create one) Consumer Key from Developer/Production Org
